nodes.text: Iasa was a male Jawa who lived on Tatooine during the Galactic Civil War.

A personal friend of Chief Kalit, he was entrusted with Kalit's credits and sandcrawler, in addition to the safety of his wife and shaman, Aved Luun. When Kalit returned, he found his credits spent, his sandcrawler sold and Aved nowhere in sight.
When Luke Skywalker arrived at Chalmun's Cantina with Ben Kenobi, R2-D2 and C-3PO in 0 BBY, Iasa approached Skywalker's X-34 landspeeder but was shooed away by the young Skywalker.
